versos: (oven) Hosea 7:4 - "They are all adulterers, burning like an oven whose fire the baker does not need to stir from the kneading of the dough till it rises.";;;

(flanks) Ezekiel 21:21 - "For the king of Babylon stands at the parting of the way, at the head of the two ways, to use divination; he shakes the arrows, he consults the household idols, he looks at the liver.";;;
(forgiven) Ephesians 4:32 - "Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, as God in Christ forgave you.";;;
(utter) Proverbs 8:6 - "Listen, for I have trustworthy things to say; I open my lips to speak what is right.";;;
(unclean) "And what nation is there so great, that hath statutes and judgments so righteous as all this law, which I set before you this day" - Deuteronomy 4:8;;;
(carcase) Leviticus 11:39 - And if any beast, of which ye may eat, die; he that toucheth the carcase thereof shall be unclean until the even.;;;
(erred) Psalm 95:10 - "For forty years I was grieved with that generation and said, 'It is a people who go astray in their hearts, And they do not know My ways.'";;;
(sweareth) Matthew 5:34 - But I say unto you, Swear not at all; neither by heaven; for it is God's throne.;;;
(wholly) 1 Thessalonians 5:23 - "Now may the God of peace himself sanctify you completely, and may your whole spirit and soul and body be kept blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.";;;
(offereth) Psalm 50:23 - "Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me: and to him that ordereth his conversation aright will I shew the salvation of God.";;;
(earthen) 2 Corinthians 4:7 - But we have this treasure in earthen vessels
(judge) "Do not judge, or you too will be judged." - Matthew 7:1;;;
(levy) Nehemiah 5:4 - "Still others were saying, "We have had to borrow money to pay the king's tax on our fields and vineyards.";;;
